text.p: I've now, after a bit of Googling and fiddling with Bochs to try to get
to work (fails with gtk+-2.0 not found), got QEMU working and, by using:
can get into it with gdb by running
Before we enable paging, this is the pagedir:
And this is the page table at 0xC000:
Except that the page corresponding to 0xC0100000 is the 0x100th entry in this page table, which is NOT 0x100000 (as we'd want) but rather is 0x50000, which is STUPID ME IDIOT ARGH!
Though even now, triple fault on my machine, and Bochs still says page not present, though GDB+QEMU tells me that the page table at 0xC000 starts as:
which looks better. Pagedir is as before.
